com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto

Interface ISynchronizationInfo


  • public interface ISynchronizationInfo
    Interface for allowing a client to construct synchronization information that it cares about to pass in to various SCM methods. When an instance of this interface is passed into an SCM method that accepts it, the method will throw StaleDataException if any of the times on the server are different from what was passed in.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ISynchronizationInfo.SynchronizationInfoCreator 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ISynchronizationInfo.SynchronizationInfoCreator FACTORY
      Clients should call ISynchronizationInfo.FACTORY.newInstance() to create new ISynchronizationInfo instances

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeHistoryTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace, IComponentHandle component, ISyncTime changeHistoryTime)
      Add the change history time of the current workspace/component pair to the synchronization
      void addConfigurationTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace, IComponentHandle component, ISyncTime configurationTime)
      Add the configuration time of the current workspace/component pair to the synchronization
      void addWorkspaceTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace, ISyncTime workspaceTime)
      Add the workspace with the given workspace time to the synchronization.
      ISynchronizationTimes[] getSyncTimes()
      Returns the synchronization info represented by the receiver in a format suitable for passing to the SCM service methods.
      void updateTimes(IWorkspaceHandle workspace, IUpdateReport report)
      This will update (or add if they don't exist) all the change history, configuration and workspace times found in the update report to the receiver.

    • Method Detail

      • addWorkspaceTime

        void addWorkspaceTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace,
                    ISyncTime workspaceTime)
        Add the workspace with the given workspace time to the synchronization.
        Parameters:
        workspace - the workspace
        workspaceTime - the workspace time the client currently knows.

      • addChangeHistoryTime

        void addChangeHistoryTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace,
                        IComponentHandle component,
                        ISyncTime changeHistoryTime)
        Add the change history time of the current workspace/component pair to the synchronization
        Parameters:

        component - the component
        changeHistoryTime - the change history time the client currently knows

      • addConfigurationTime

        void addConfigurationTime(IWorkspaceHandle workspace,
                        IComponentHandle component,
                        ISyncTime configurationTime)
        Add the configuration time of the current workspace/component pair to the synchronization
        Parameters:
        workspace - the workspace
        component - the component
        configurationTime - the configuration time the client currently knows

      • updateTimes

        void updateTimes(IWorkspaceHandle workspace,
               IUpdateReport report)
        This will update (or add if they don't exist) all the change history, configuration and workspace times found in the update report to the receiver.
        Parameters:
        report - the report to take times from.

      • getSyncTimes

        ISynchronizationTimes[] getSyncTimes()
        Returns the synchronization info represented by the receiver in a format suitable for passing to the SCM service methods.
        Returns:
        an array of ISynchronizationTimes, possibly null.
